description:
The Cubit Stretch Down Smock is a modern, more sustainable twist on a traditional style. Giving a second life to quality down that might have otherwise ended up in landfill, the Cubit Stretch Down Smock is filled with the 700FP P.U.R.E recycled down.

It features innovative Pertex®3D Weave Technology, which allows the baffles to be woven from a single length of stretch fabric without any stitching. This improves down lofting, increases wind resistance, reduces weight, and allows the material to flex and stretch as you move. The Pertex® Quantum outer fabric is wind and weather resistant, and with a fluorocarbon free DWR finish it protects from wild winter weather.

Perfect for everyday at the crag or an evening by the campfire, the Cubit Stretch Down Smock has a cosy down filled hood and slim fit for that extra snug feel in freezing temperatures. It has two useful zipped hand pockets and a fleece lined chin guard with durable YKK® VISLON® half zip for quick ventilation or locked in warmth.
name: Rab Cubit Stretch Down Smock - Mens
